title: Unexpected Peloton in the Packing Area: Stage 6 of 2024 Vuelta a España Will Start inside a Superstore
content:
French supermarket giant Carrefour celebrates Vuelta sponsorship anniversary by bringing the peloton into the produce aisles.

Read the full article at Unexpected Peloton in the Packing Area: Stage 6 of 2024 Vuelta a España Will Start inside a Superstore on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
